english.segment1: Chorus. My heart is yours. Lord i belong to you. I would do anything. Just to be close to you. Your love is so amazing. Cant keep it to myself. I gotta tell the world. I belong to you
english.segment2: Bridge 1. Lord I'm amazed. By your great grace. Thats why i cant keep it to myself. I gotta tell it whever I go
english.segment3: Bridge 2. You are my healer. Your my provider. Thats why i cant keep it to myself. I gotta tell it whever I go
english.segment4: Bridge 3. Gives me direction. Your my protection. Thats why i cant keep it to myself. I gotta tell it whever I go
english.segment5: Bridge 4. Lord you are Faithful. I am so greatful. Thats why i cant keep it to myself. I gotta tell it whever I go
